dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1967 IH: Bureau of Reclamation Pumped Storage Hydropower Development Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lamborn (for himself, Mr. Newhouse, and Mrs. McMorris Rodgers) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Reclamation Project Act of 1939 to authorize pumped storage hydropower development utilizing multiple Bureau of Reclamation reservoirs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bureau of Reclamation Pumped Storage Hydropower Development Act.

section.header: Authority for pumped storage hydropower development utilizing multiple Bureau of Reclamation reservoirs
section.text: Section 9(c)(1) of the Reclamation Project Act of 1939 (43 U.S.C. 485h(c)(1)) is amended by inserting and pumped storage hydropower development utilizing multiple Bureau of Reclamation reservoirs after including small conduit hydropower development .
